description: Even if her job title is simply being Taizou`s secretary or personal assistant, Kashiwagi is no exception to the sidekick/alter ego dynamic and is generally very handy to have around. Kashiwagi performs many roles as she accompanies Taizou which include assisting with visual aids during mission briefings and preventing Taizou from giving an order or making a decision whose aftermath would most likely be rather messy.
name: Kashiwagi Oboro
